subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Goalies who have starred at the top level of Finnish hockey, the SM-liiga, are the soup du jour in the N.H.L., like Tim Thomas of the Boston Bruins.
snippet: Goalies who have starred at the top level of Finnish hockey, the SM-liiga, are the soup du jour in the N.H.L., like Tim Thomas of the Boston Bruins.
